Record Class Card

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
model.Card
Record Components:
suit - the suit of the card
rank - the rank of the card
public record Card(Suit suit, Rank rank) extends Record
Represents a card in the Blackjack game. A card has a suit and a rank.
Version:
1.0.0.
Author:
ptrzgal

  • Method Details

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      Returns the value of the card based on its rank.
      Returns:
      the value of the card, corresponding to its rank (e.g., 2-10, J=10, Q=10, K=10, A=1 or 11)

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object).
      Specified by:
